en.title: How to Introduce a Kitten to Your Existing Cat | 5 Steps for Success
en.content:
Introducing a new kitten to a resident cat should be done carefully. Taking it slow and proceeding step by step is the key to success.

5-Step Introduction Method

Step 1: Separate Rooms (3-7 Days)

Keep the kitten in a separate room and let them get used to each other's presence through the door.

Step 2: Scent Swapping (Several Days)

Exchange towels or bedding that each cat has used so they become familiar with each other's scent.

Step 3: Feeding Through the Door

Feed both cats on opposite sides of the door so they associate each other's presence with something positive (mealtime).

Step 4: Short Face-to-Face Meetings

Open the door slightly for short meetings (5-10 minutes). If there is mild hissing, observe calmly; if it becomes intense, stop the session.

Step 5: Free Interaction

If things go well, gradually increase the time they spend together. It may take several weeks to several months for them to become fully comfortable with each other.

zh.title: 小猫与先住猫的见面方法 | 成功引荐的5个步骤
zh.content:
新来的小猫和先住猫的见面需要谨慎进行。不要着急，循序渐进是成功的秘诀。

5步引荐法

步骤1：分房间生活（3-7天）

将小猫隔离在单独的房间，让双方通过门缝逐渐熟悉彼此的存在。

步骤2：气味交换（数天）

交换双方使用过的毛巾或窝垫，让它们熟悉彼此的气味。

步骤3：隔门喂食

在门的两侧分别喂食，让它们将对方的存在与好事（吃饭）联系起来。

步骤4：短时间面对面

将门略微打开，进行短时间（5-10分钟）的对面接触。轻微的威吓可以观察，激烈时请中断。

步骤5：自由交流

如果没有问题，逐渐增加在一起的时间。完全和睦相处可能需要数周到数月时间。
